column4: are there any problems with anything specific when running amd64 versions?
the only problems you'll have are with things that only exist for the x86 version, such as java browser plugins, flash, multimedia codecs and so on
ok.. trying to decide if i should try out amd64 for the first time.. or just stick with x86 as i've always done
it depends what the system is for really. on a desktop I'm not convinced you gain anything by going to the amd64 version - most things are waiting for disk/user data, not the cpu
